hint.en:
JSON array. Each formula has its own input state. Operators: AND(*,&), OR(+,|), XOR(^,!=), NOT(!).

JSON will be auto-formatted when you save.

Example:
[{"id":"f1","name":"Main Logic","expression":"A AND B AND NOT C","enabled":true,"timeout":30,"firstImpression":false}]

timeout: seconds before timeout (omit/0 = infinite)
firstImpression: false (default) = reactive mode, true/1 = lock inputs at first value
hint.no:
JSON-array. Hver formel har sin egen input-tilstand. Operatorer: AND(*,&), OR(+,|), XOR(^,!=), NOT(!).

JSON vil bli auto-formatert når du lagrer.

Eksempel:
[{"id":"f1","name":"Hovedlogikk","expression":"A AND B AND NOT C","enabled":true,"timeout":30,"firstImpression":false}]

timeout: sekunder før timeout (utelat/0 = uendelig)
firstImpression: false (standard) = reaktiv modus, true/1 = lås inputs ved første verdi
hint.de:
JSON-Array. Jede Formel hat ihren eigenen Eingangszustand. Operatoren: AND(*,&), OR(+,|), XOR(^,!=), NOT(!).

JSON wird beim Speichern automatisch formatiert.

Beispiel:
[{"id":"f1","name":"Hauptlogik","expression":"A AND B AND NOT C","enabled":true,"timeout":30,"firstImpression":false}]

timeout: Sekunden vor Zeitüberschreitung (weglassen/0 = unendlich)
firstImpression: false (Standard) = reaktiver Modus, true/1 = Eingänge beim ersten Wert sperren
hint.nl:
JSON-array. Elke formule heeft zijn eigen invoerstatus. Operatoren: AND(*,&), OR(+,|), XOR(^,!=), NOT(!).

JSON wordt automatisch opgemaakt bij het opslaan.

Voorbeeld:
[{"id":"f1","name":"Hoofdlogica","expression":"A AND B AND NOT C","enabled":true,"timeout":30,"firstImpression":false}]

timeout: seconden voor time-out (weglaten/0 = oneindig)
firstImpression: false (standaard) = reactieve modus, true/1 = vergrendel invoer bij eerste waarde
hint.fr:
Tableau JSON. Chaque formule a son propre état d'entrée. Opérateurs : AND(*,&), OR(+,|), XOR(^,!=), NOT(!).

Le JSON sera formaté automatiquement lors de l'enregistrement.

Exemple :
[{"id":"f1","name":"Logique Principale","expression":"A AND B AND NOT C","enabled":true,"timeout":30,"firstImpression":false}]

timeout : secondes avant l'expiration (omettre/0 = infini)
firstImpression : false (par défaut) = mode réactif, true/1 = verrouiller les entrées à la première valeur
hint.da:
JSON-array. Hver formel har sin egen input-tilstand. Operatorer: AND(*,&), OR(+,|), XOR(^,!=), NOT(!).

JSON bliver auto-formateret, når du gemmer.

Eksempel:
[{"id":"f1","name":"Hovedlogik","expression":"A AND B AND NOT C","enabled":true,"timeout":30,"firstImpression":false}]

timeout: sekunder før timeout (udelad/0 = uendelig)
firstImpression: false (standard) = reaktiv tilstand, true/1 = lås input ved første værdi
hint.fi:
JSON-taulukko. Jokaisella kaavalla on oma syötetila. Operaattorit: AND(*,&), OR(+,|), XOR(^,!=), NOT(!).

JSON muotoillaan automaattisesti tallennettaessa.

Esimerkki:
[{"id":"f1","name":"Päälogiikka","expression":"A AND B AND NOT C","enabled":true,"timeout":30,"firstImpression":false}]

timeout: sekuntia ennen aikakatkaisua (jätä pois/0 = ääretön)
firstImpression: false (oletus) = reaktiivinen tila, true/1 = lukitse syötteet ensimmäiseen arvoon
hint.sv:
JSON-array. Varje formel har sin egen ingångsstatus. Operatorer: AND(*,&), OR(+,|), XOR(^,!=), NOT(!).

JSON kommer att autoformateras när du sparar.

Exempel:
[{"id":"f1","name":"Huvudlogik","expression":"A AND B AND NOT C","enabled":true,"timeout":30,"firstImpression":false}]

timeout: sekunder före timeout (utelämna/0 = oändlig)
firstImpression: false (standard) = reaktivt läge, true/1 = lås ingångar vid första värdet
hint.pl:
Tablica JSON. Każda formuła ma swój własny stan wejściowy. Operatory: AND(*,&), OR(+,|), XOR(^,!=), NOT(!).

JSON zostanie automatycznie sformatowany po zapisaniu.

Przykład:
[{"id":"f1","name":"Główna Logika","expression":"A AND B AND NOT C","enabled":true,"timeout":30,"firstImpression":false}]

timeout: sekundy do przekroczenia limitu czasu (pomiń/0 = nieskończony)
firstImpression: false (domyślnie) = tryb reaktywny, true/1 = zablokuj wejścia przy pierwszej wartości
hint.it:
Array JSON. Ogni formula ha il proprio stato di input. Operatori: AND(*,&), OR(+,|), XOR(^,!=), NOT(!).

Il JSON verrà formattato automaticamente al salvataggio.

Esempio:
[{"id":"f1","name":"Logica Principale","expression":"A AND B AND NOT C","enabled":true,"timeout":30,"firstImpression":false}]

timeout: secondi prima del timeout (omettere/0 = infinito)
firstImpression: false (predefinito) = modalità reattiva, true/1 = blocca gli input al primo valore
hint.es:
Array JSON. Cada fórmula tiene su propio estado de entrada. Operadores: AND(*,&), OR(+,|), XOR(^,!=), NOT(!).

El JSON se formateará automáticamente al guardar.

Ejemplo:
[{"id":"f1","name":"Lógica Principal","expression":"A AND B AND NOT C","enabled":true,"timeout":30,"firstImpression":false}]

timeout: segundos antes del tiempo de espera (omitir/0 = infinito)
firstImpression: false (predeterminado) = modo reactivo, true/1 = bloquear entradas en el primer valor

hint.en:
